sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: An Indian railway minister has revealed an electric signal error appears to have caused the railway crash that claimed more than 300 victims.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The signal fault meant one of the two high-speed passenger trains was travelling on the wrong track.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The news came as engineers worked to remove the mangled carriages from the line.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The major part was the removal of capsized coaches and wagons.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: So last night all the capsized coaches and wagons have been removed from site.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Now the major part left is the restoration of track, which is the rail track, and the overhead wire, which we call OHG wire.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Prime Minister Narendra Modi, visiting some of the 800 people being treated in hospital after the crash, vowed to punish those responsible.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It's been revealed the two express trains were carrying 2,296 people when the crash happened on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Saturday night in Dnipro in central Ukraine and rescuers search for survivors after Russian

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: airstrikes on a residential area of the city.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: They were to find dozens of wounded people as they search using bare hands and cutting equipment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A two-year-old girl was killed in the attack.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: President Volodymyr Zelensky shared pictures of the rescuers on Facebook and condemned the attack on civilians, saying once again Russia has shown itself to be a terrorist state.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Kyiv also came under fire on Saturday with the city's administration reporting its air defences foiled a three-hour aerial assault.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: On the other side of the border, the governor of Belgorod claimed two Russians were killed on Saturday by a Ukrainian shell fire.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The city's playing host to thousands of displaced people from villages closer to the border with Ukraine who fled after cross-border incursions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Showing their rejection of violence and gun culture, tens of thousands of protesters took

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: to the streets of Serbia's capital, Belgrade.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: They were calling for President Aleksandar Vucic to stand down, holding him responsible for promoting violence and hate speech that they say led to two mass shootings last month that left 18 people dead, including schoolchildren.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The populist president rejected their calls. Many people rallied in Serbia's capital for a fifth time in a month following two mass shootings that shook the country. The crowds chanting slogans against President Vucic marched through the city center and gathered in front of his downtown office. University students led the march holding a banner that read Serbia Against Violence, which is the main slogan of the protests.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Some media report that this was the biggest protest so far.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Stefan Goranovic, Euronews, Belgrade.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Recep Tayyip Erdogan announced his new cabinet on the day of his swearing-in to his third

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: presidential term.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In a sign his new government might pursue more conventional economic policies, he put former banker Mehmet Simsek, a former finance minister and deputy prime minister, in charge of the economy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The appointment comes as Turkey is grappling with inflation that peaked at 85 percent in October.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg was there hoping to urge Turkey to approve Sweden's membership of the alliance.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Three Israeli soldiers and one Egyptian officer were killed along their shared border after a deadly gunfight broke out on Saturday. An Israeli military spokesperson said

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: the fighting began overnight when soldiers thwarted a drug smuggling attempt across the border.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: A male and female soldier were found dead at an army post. The army said the Egyptian police officer was killed in a second exchange of fire in which a third soldier was killed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Deadly violence is rare between the countries who signed a peace treaty in 1979 and maintain close security ties.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: It's the end of a bittersweet journey.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Football club Paris Saint-Germain has confirmed Lionel Messi's departure at the end of the season after a two-year stay.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Messi, 35, played his last match for the PSG on Saturday evening against Clermont to the sounds of jeers and whistles.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Argentinian scored 32 goals in 74 matches, but the club failed to perform well in the Champions League, and for many fans, he embodied the team's shortcomings.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The seven-times Ballon d'Or winner's contract is set to expire at the end of June.
